name: Astro Arcade
description:
We had three space-themed co-op arcade games, but the wires got crossed somewhere and they ended up in the same cabinet! Astro Arcade is a collection of three distinct 2-player co-op challenges where you clear the same levels while being connected to your partner in different ways. This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK GameJam 2021.

Controls

Player 1

Cosmic Kayak: W to engage front thruster, S to engage back thruster

Celestial Chain: W to move forwards, A/D to rotate

Spaceballs: Q to push away from your partner, E to pull towards them.

Player 2

Cosmic Kayak: Arrow Key Up to engage front thruster, Arrow Key Down to engage back thruster

Celestial Chain: Arrow Key Up to move forwards, Left/Right to rotate

Spaceballs: U to push away from your partner, O to pull towards them.
